Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on photos that have been circulating online since at least 2016 and have been featured in media reports.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the man in the photos is not actually 146 years old, as confirmed by Guinness World Records and other reports.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the age of the man in the photos by stating that he is 146 years old.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists, which is that the photos are not recent and do not actually depict a 146-year-old man.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it relies on misleading information and does not provide accurate evidence to support the age claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the photos are proof of the man's age without considering other factors or verifying the information.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
